title: Ticket #1207: trunk build errors on non-CSL machine with HAVE_EXT_CLASSADS not set
description:
Here's my configure invocation (as you can see, I disable a lot of features that I don't need): 

./configure --without-globus --without-srb --without-blahp \
--without-postgresql --disable-gcc-version-check --disable-glibc-version-check \
--disable-stork --disable-quill --without-krb5 --without-openssl \
--without-unicoregahp --without-coredumper --without-linuxlibcheaders \
--without-x --without-drmaa --disable-full-port --without-voms --without-gcb \
--without-hadoop --without-libxml2 --without-libvirt --without-cream \
--without-blahp

This is building on my openSUSE 11.2 laptop.
remarks:
2010-Feb-11 14:56:11 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to V7_5_1-branch for Condor 7.5.1.
check_ins: 2010-Feb-11 14:54   Check-in [17207]: Remove checks for new ClassAds external. #1207 We link against the new ClassAds library built under src/classad (though probably not for long), and new ClassAds are alwasy required. So remove checks for the presence of the new ClassAds external. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: nleroy
